title: Thieves' Honor
description: "Run, Rabbit, Run." After weeks in the Esposito Hotel, I now know three things:  1. The Gentlemen are liars. 2. The Trilogy took my sister. 3. My father is insane. I've been reminded of who I am and who my enemies are. Nico lied to me, and Beck and Rush backed him up.  I'm on my own againâ€”the spare to the heir, with nothing to lose and no one I can trust. All I care about is finding Sophie, and getting the hell out of St. Adrian. I'm ready to run.  But, with three brutal men willing to hunt me down, and the force of my father's whole army on my tail...wish me luck. The clock is ticking... Thieves' Honor is an enemies to lovers contemporary mafia romance where the female main character will end up with multiple love interests by the end of the series. All the characters are in their mid-twenties. There are dark themes and graphic violence, but no bullying or violence toward the main character. This is book two of three.
author: Kate   King
